post.summary: Login user with email and password
post.description: Login user with registered email and password. The API will return token to access protected route

400.description: Login failed. Email and password must be filled

example.data: Login failed. Email must be type of email. Email and password must be filled

post.summary: Register user with email, password, name, date_birth, gender
post.description: Register user with email, password, name, date_birth, gender. This API will not auto-login the user, so will not return token for accessed protected route

400.description: Register user failed. All field must be filled or the given data was invalid

value.data: Register failed. Email must be type of email
Register failed. Password must be 8 character minimum
Register failed. All field must be filled

post.summary: Logout user with JSON Web Token (JWT)

400.description: Search course failed, query cannot be empty

get.description: Get all course from category by category id

400.description: Category id was invalid, so the category was not found

get.description: Get the most popular courses, limit to 5

200.description: Get the most popular courses success

get.description: Get course detail by course id. Client can send JWT token and user id in request body. If the user id inside JWT token matches with user id client send in request body, the field 'already_owned' in the response become true.
get.summary: Get course detail by course id

200.description: Get course detail by course id success

get.description: Get course progression of a user

data.title: Title 2
data.overview: Alami Pembelajaran langsung dari para expertnya dan memiliki pemahaman baru tentang Enterpreneurship.
data.description:
JUDUL

Terdiri dari beberapa bagian part pembelajaran untuk mendapatkan pengetahuan dan pemahaman baru tentang bagaimana cara membangun usaha, hal-hal apa saja yang dibutuhkan dalam membangun usaha baik secara internal maupun eksternal,



SUB JUDUL

Memulai dari awal dan dasar-dasar yang perlu dibangun atau fundamental dalam membangun Enterpreneurship dan juga melihat perkembangan zaman dan teknologi yang berdasarkan IoT sebagai pusat pembelajaran utama dalam masyarakat.

quiz.question: Ini adalah deskripsi dari pertanyaan quiz. Berikut adalah pertanyaannya dan silahkan tuliskan jawaban quiznya, bagaimana pendapat anda mengenai materi yang baru saja anda pelajari ?
